steps.notes: Mine mare regolith from surface
Screen and separate size fractions
Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Hot roll regolith metal into bar or billet shapes

recipe_def.assumptions: ISRU route using regolith metal; 5% rolling loss to scale and trim
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant using regolith_metal_crude from regolith. Enables local production of steel bar and billet stock for forging and machining.

steps.notes: Roll billet into bar stock

inputs.notes: Steel billet for rolling into bar stock

recipe_def.assumptions: Local production path; placeholder; replace with detailed BOM and routing as needed.
recipe_def.notes: Converted from import_stub to a local production path using the existing rolling process.

steps.notes: Draw steel rod stock to appropriate filler wire diameter
Spool wire, inspect for defects, package for use

recipe_def.assumptions: Steel filler wire drawn from rod stock to standard diameters for welding and brazing applications.
recipe_def.notes: Basic filler wire for joining operations. Can be used for both welding and brazing depending on composition.

steps.notes: Cast pipe segments and fittings from regolith metal.
Machine threads, deburr ends, and finish fittings.

recipe_def.assumptions: Small-batch piping components cast and machined from regolith metal.
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant for piping components using regolith metal feedstock.

recipe_def.assumptions: Cast small races; machine and finish to bearing dimensions; finishing not modeled yet.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse local route for bearing_set_small; refine with grinding/finishing in a future update.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for bearing_set_small (v0)

steps.notes: Machine pump body/end caps/gears/drive shaft to tight tolerances, assemble internal gears with seals and bearings, pressure test pump for leaks and verify flow rate, inspect pump operation and seal integrity

recipe_def.assumptions: Small hydraulic pump for auxiliary systems and light-duty machinery - gear or piston pump design with precision machined components
recipe_def.notes: Fabrication of small hydraulic pump requiring precision machining for tight internal clearances and pressure testing for leak verification

steps.notes: Cast cylinder body
Machine bore/ports
Assemble seals/rod (seals imported)

recipe_def.assumptions: Coarse cylinder build; seals/precision components imported.
recipe_def.notes: Placeholder; refine with detailed specs later.

steps.notes: Cut plate/structural members for press frame and platen mounts.
Weld frame, platen supports, and cylinder mounts.
Machine platen surfaces, mounting holes, and guide surfaces.
Assemble cylinder, hoses, valves, and power unit.
Fill/bleed hydraulics, set relief valve, perform leak and function checks.
Wire controls, interlocks, and gauges.
Cycle press under load, verify stroke, pressure, and safety systems.

recipe_def.assumptions: Small/medium hydraulic stamping press; precision limited by coarse machining; controls minimal.
recipe_def.notes: Local build route for basic stamping press.
